code: import React,{useCallback,useRef,useState}from"react";import Webcam from"react-webcam";import"./webcamera.css";import CamIcon from"../../../assets/images/camera.png";import Reload from"../../../assets/images/reload.png";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Webcamera(_ref){let{tg,captImg}=_ref;const[img,setImg]=useState(null);const webcamRef=useRef(null);const videoConstraints={width:420,height:420,facingMode:"user"};const capture=useCallback(()=>{const imageSrc=webcamRef.current.getScreenshot();setImg(imageSrc);},[webcamRef]);function collectedImg(){console.log(img);if(img!==null){captImg(img);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"camera-container",children:img===null?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Webcam,{audio:false,mirrored:true,height:400,width:400,ref:webcamRef,screenshotFormat:"image/jpeg",videoConstraints:videoConstraints}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:capture,className:"snap-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:" camera-img",src:CamIcon,alt:"Scholar",width:""})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img,alt:"screenshot",className:"cam"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flexy flexyM offset-md-3",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setImg(null),className:"snap-btn",title:"Retake photo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Reload,alt:"screenshot",className:"",width:"70%"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:collectedImg,className:"set-snap-btn btn btn-success",title:"Upload photo to file",children:"Set"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:tg,className:"close-snap-btn btn btn-danger",title:"Close camera",children:"Close"})]})]})});}export default Webcamera;
